verses.verse: And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H2374>seer<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6440>meet<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>, Shouldest thou <S%H5826>help<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and <S%H157>love<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? <S%H2063>for<s%> this thing <S%H7110>wrath<s%> is upon thee from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H61><s%> there are <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H1197>thee<s%>, in that thou hast put away the <S%H842>Asheroth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and hast <S%H3559>set<s%> thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and brought them <S%H7725>back<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.
And he <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> throughout all the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H5892>city<s%> by <S%H5892>city<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8199>judges<s%>, <S%H7200>Consider<s%> what ye <S%H6213>do<s%>: for ye <S%H8199>judge<s%> not for <S%H120>man<s%>, but for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he is with you in the <S%H1697>judgment<s%>.

Now therefore let the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be upon <S%H8104>you<s%>; take heed and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>it<s%>: for there is no iniquity with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, nor <S%H4856>respect<s%> of <S%H6440>persons<s%>, nor <S%H4727>taking<s%> of <S%H7810>bribes<s%>.

Moreover in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> did <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and for <S%H7379>controversies<s%>. And they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, Thus shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H530>faithfully<s%>, and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And whensoever any controversy shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you from your <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>, between <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%>, between <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, ye shall <S%H2094>warn<s%> <S%H816>them<s%>, that they be not guilty towards <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and so <S%H7110>wrath<s%> come upon you and upon your <S%H251>brethren<s%>: <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, and ye shall not be <S%H816>guilty<s%>.

And <S%H568><s%>, behold, Amariah the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> is over you in all <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, in all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>matters<s%>: also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>. Deal <S%H2388>courageously<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be with the <S%H2896>good<s%>.
